ygData.subject: Re: Jig and Mana Regeneration
ygData.msgSnippet: that is true, but i think that was directed at clarity spell of enchanters and mana song of bards, whereas jig may be an indirect way of mana regen that was
ygData.messageBody:
that is true, but i think that was directed at clarity spell of enchanters
and mana song of bards, whereas jig may be an indirect way of mana regen
that was not addressed by the patch, so it may be worth testing.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 46 Bard, Mithaniel Marr

>

> Lulen
